name: Gym Exercises
des: Set a goal to continue with the workout programme for 3 months. Creating a long-term exercise routine is all about habits

name: Sports
des: It increases your energy level. It boosts your mood and attitude. It helps your body adjust to even routine activities and stability.

name: Morning Jogging
des: A morning run overnight fast can increase fat oxidation exercise and help you to decrease intake overfollowing exercise

name: Yoga
des: Slow movements and deep breathing increase blood flow and warm up muscles, while holding a pose can build strength

name: Swimming
des: Builds endurance,strength and cardiovascular fitness. helps you maintain a healthy weight,heart and lungs. tones muscles.

name: Home Exercises
des: Home exercise guarantee more regular exercises, the body is healing more naturally and in a more constructive fashion
